sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../styles/components.css'; const ResultsDisplay = ({ result, originalImage }) => { const downloadImage = () => { const link = document.createElement('a'); link.href = result.optimizedImage; link.download = `optimized-${Date.now()}.${result.format}`; link.click(); }; const savings = ((1 - result.size / originalImage.file.size) * 100).toFixed(1); const sizeReduction = (originalImage.file.size - result.size) / 1024; return (

âœ… Optimization Complete!

AI Enhanced
Compression
{result.compressionRatio}%

Quality Score
{result.qualityScore}
/100 points
Level
{result.optimizationLevel}
Optimization
Savings
{savings}%
File Size

Original

Size: {(originalImage.file.size / 1024).toFixed(2)} KB
Dimensions: {result.originalWidth} Ã— {result.originalHeight}

Optimized ({result.format.toUpperCase()})

Size: {(result.size / 1024).toFixed(2)} KB
Dimensions: {result.width} Ã— {result.height}
Saved: {sizeReduction.toFixed(2)} KB

ðŸ“Š Processing Details

Format: {result.format}
Metadata: {result.metadata.stripMetadata ? 'Removed' : 'Preserved'}
Progressive: {result.metadata.progressive ? 'Yes' : 'No'}
Enhancements: {result.metadata.enhancementsApplied ? 'Applied' : 'Not Applied'}
); }; export default ResultsDisplay;
